1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Hassan bin Bilal said:"1 saw Ammar bin Yasir performing Wudu, so he went through his beard (with his hand). It was said to him" - or he said - "1 said: 'You go through your beard?' He said: 'And what is there to prevent me? Indeed I saw Allah's Messenger going through his beard

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَخْلِيلِ اللِّحْيَةِ
chapter.eng-name: [What Has Been narrated] About Going through The Beard
